section.p: You realize that you have committed an act of sacrilege by stealing from the temple - you know in your heart that Tyrnai has cursed you.

You will never be a great fighter while you suffer the wrath of Tyrnai. Subtract 1 from your COMBAT ability until you can find a way of lifting the curse. Perhaps the priests of Sig in Marlock City can help you. Note that you are under ‘
, -1 COMBAT.’
